description:
These videos have helped hundreds of people land their dream career jobs and it has been developed from many years of hiring the best talent. They are segmented into sections relevant to each component of the application and interview process and where valuable are role played with candidates we have helped achieve their dream careers.

Anyone who is approaching the application for or the first interview for a corporate career job should look at this course and approach each element of the application with the relevant video for that section. It is broken into each component so the student can choose the most relevant course for the component of the application process they are approaching.

Each lesson is a video of 3 - 6 mins and can be viewed in isolation or can all be watched over about 90 mins.

Students should take this course as securing the interview is that hard part so it is essential to perform strongly in the interview to maximise success
title: Land That Job
